member.name: T:SmartFran.Seed.Resource
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SmartFran.Seed.Resource.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SmartFran.Seed.Resource.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SmartFran.Seed.Resource.ThrowJsonExceptionDefaultErrorMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Se presentó una condición de falla. Por favor, reintente y si se repite el inconveniente comuníquelo al soporte técnico del sistema..
